location: INOXDINE, Studentsâ€™ Union Building, Durham Road, Sheffield S10 2TG
title: Data Science and AI Community Meeting II
body:
Welcome to the second Sheffield Data Science and AI Community Meeting. Invitations were sent to all who signed up via our previous survey on IGs & Community Meeting II.

Provisional agenda: 
14:00 - 15:00 Interest group building activities (presentations, group discussion, Turing dialogs). 
15:00 - 16:00 Problem-solution/grant dating activities (presentation & individual discussion). 
16:00 - 17:00 Socialising over tea and coffee and follow-up discussions.
